titles.title: Open the Eyes of My Heart

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Open the eyes of my heart, Lord
Open the eyes of my heart
I want to see You
I want to see You

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
To see You high and lifted up
Shinin' in the light of Your glory
Pour out Your power and love
As we sing holy, holy, holy

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Holy, holy, holy
We cry holy, holy, holy
You are holy, holy, holy
I want to see you

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
Holy, holy, holy
Holy, holy, holy
You are holy, holy, holy
I want to see you

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
Holy, holy, holy
Holy, holy, holy
Holy, holy, holy,
I want to see you
